receipts.items: Premium cat food (15kg) and dog food (20kg)
Mixed pet food supplies for street feeding

impactStories.title: Fed 45 street cats in downtown area
impactStories.description: Regular feeding spot where a colony of 15+ cats gather daily. Today's meal provided by your shopping!

impactStories.title: Riverside dog community fed
impactStories.description: Group of 12 street dogs who live near the river. They wait patiently every evening for food.

impactStories.title: Emergency food for abandoned kittens
impactStories.description: Found a litter of 5 kittens abandoned in a box. Provided immediate food and called local rescue.

timeline.title: Reached 2,000 meals milestone
timeline.description: Thanks to your shopping, we crossed 2,000 meals provided to street pets! This is just the beginning.

timeline.title: Expanded to new areas
timeline.description: Started feeding street pets in two additional neighborhoods after community requests.

timeline.title: First 1,000 meals
timeline.description: Celebrated our first 1,000 meals provided to homeless animals. Every purchase matters!

timeline.title: Website launched
timeline.description: Paws & Hearts went live, beginning our mission to help street cats and dogs through conscious shopping.
